name: Ferret Monogatari: Watashi no Okiniiri
description:
Ferret Monogatari: Watashi no Okiniiri is an action-strategy game developed by Culture Brain. It came out on 28-04-2000. Culture Brain USA published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Ferret Monogatari: Watashi no Okiniiri is available on Game Boy Color.
